Title: Gnomeo & Juliet
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Romance
Writer: Rob Sprackling (story), Johnny Smith (story), Andy Riley (story), Kevin Cecil (story), Kelly Asbury (story), Steve Hamilton Shaw (story), Andy Riley (screenplay), Kevin Cecil (screenplay), Mark Burton (screenplay), Emily Cook (screenplay), Kathy Greenberg (screenplay), Steve Hamilton Shaw (screenplay), Kelly Asbury (screenplay), Rob Sprackling (original screenplay), Johnny Smith (original screenplay), William Shakespeare (play), Arthur Brooke
Actors: James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Ashley Jensen, Michael Caine
Plot: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 11 nominations.
